Text:
I thought the first episode had no audio, but it is in AC3 format, which I didn't have the codec for.  I got it for quicktime here (the rest are in mp3): http://trac.cod3r.com/a52codec/

I didn't know this at the time, so I downloaded 3 different versions of this season... this is by far the best one!  Thanks a bunch guys!
Thanks muchly, this show just keeps getting better and better... you're the best!!
